_header: Come my sweet come my flower
Subjects: Christ, address to the Virgin Mary; Assumption, feast of; Virgin Mary, assumption of
_description: Verses incorporated in a sermon for the feast of the Assumption — two couplets in Mirk’s Festial

BodGoughet4.Transcription:
Com my swete com my flourCom my culver myn owne boureCom my
                    modry now wyth meFor Hevyn qwene I make þe
